programmes.show_description: Black Widow. When a young man with a developmental disability vanishes, his legal guardian frantically searches for him. Police turn to CCTV to find him. S8, Ep18
Michael Lane. Shana Grice was murdered after being stalked by her ex-boyfriend, Michael Lane. He denied involvement, but experts examine police videos to determine the truth. S3, Ep6
End Of Watch. The town of Cleveland, Oklahoma, is shocked when its esteemed Sheriff is shot dead. Law enforcement determines to find justice for their fellow officer. S5, Ep6
The Shootist. A closer look at real FBI cases - from murders to robberies - with dramatic re-enactments and interviews with agents and forensic scientists who work in the investigations. S7, Ep4
Teleshopping.
Teleshopping.
Teleshopping.
Teleshopping.
Machete Attack. A shocking machete attack on a puppy leaves the medical team fighting to save his life. The Animal Cops embark on the hunt for his attacker. S12, Ep5
Deadly Dealings. Contract killings arose out of the need to establish the perfect alibi, hiring someone can deflect guilt. Forensic science is changing this. S3, Ep5
Electronic Witness. Mobile phones, CCTV and cashpoints can track virtually every human move. We see exactly how this aids murder investigations. S3, Ep7
A closer look at real FBI cases - from murders to robberies - with dramatic re-enactments and interviews with agents and forensic scientists who work in the investigations. S7, Ep16
FBI Files. A closer look at real FBI cases with dramatic re-enactments and interviews with agents and forensic scientists who work in the investigations. S7, Ep18
Rolandas Poskus/Amanda Playle. Barrister Robert Rinder examines the case of Rolandas Poskus, a man who was found dead in a park in Hull, and Amanda Playle, a woman who was stalked. S5, Ep3
Welcome To The Murderhood. 40-year-old Priscilla Strole seeks a fresh start when she and her teenage son move to a small town in California, unaware it will lead to her untimely end. S3, Ep8
Lee Cutler: A Lost Soul. Lee disappeared one morning after leaving a friend. Had he gone into the wilds, or maybe joined the Israeli army? Follow the hunt for this troubled teen. S1, Ep1
The Big Guy. On Valentine's Day, Demetrius Graves is fatally stabbed. Two days later, Bonnie Ross turns up dead. Police learn they shared one fateful connection. S9, Ep14
Thomas Infante. Thomas and Lisa Infante had four children and a volatile marriage. One day Lisa announced she'd met someone else and an argument spiralled out of control. S1, Ep8
Something About Him. Rogelio Morales sweeps Margarita Sanchez Lemus off her feet. Behind Rogelio's winning smile lurks a monster who will soon show his true colours. S10, Ep7
Broken People. When Jeff Silvernail finds his partner dead at home, it appears a burglary gone wrong. But police soon uncover it is, in fact, the ultimate betrayal. S10, Ep8

programmes.show_name: American Detective With Lt Joe Kenda
programmes.show_description: Drugstore Cowboy. To solve the murder of a respected young entrepreneur, Detective Dale Mason must navigate a tangled conspiracy and outwit a band of career criminals. S2, Ep3
Claudia Lawrence/Len Saunders. Robert Rinder examines the case of 35-year-old Claudia Lawrence's disappearance. Plus, an unprovoked attack leaves a man fighting for his life. S5, Ep8
Night Caller. In 2015, 33-year-old Jonathan Cherol is shot dead in his garden. CCTV footage sends detectives on the hunt for a strange woman and a mysterious vehicle. S9, Ep9
Sri Lanka: Death At The Beach. On Christmas Day 2011, an aid worker was on holiday in Sri Lanka when he broke up an altercation in a hotel bar. His selfless act would end in murder. S1, Ep2
The Confession. When a young mum goes missing in Ellesmere Port, the whole community searches for her. After a tip, Police locate the charred suitcase that holds her remains. S1, Ep8
Don't Open The Door. In Texas, on Christmas Eve 2010, a 12-year-old boy vanishes. Police look at those closest to him, but only surveillance footage can reveal the truth. S8, Ep20
Once A Killer. Joseph Green Brown was on death row for 13 years before his convictions were overturned. Decades later, he would be charged for the murder of his wife. S7, Ep1
He Was Her Everything. Charlene Wold has a seemingly perfect family life. But her son, Logan, develops addiction problems that eventually spiral into a horrific crime. S7, Ep2
Come Home Carlie. 11-year-old Carlie disappears while walking home from a friend's house. Detectives uncover disturbing footage of a mysterious man grabbing her. S7, Ep1
One Last Shot. 30-year-old Jennifer is shot dead after a night out. Can surveillance cameras help detectives hunt down the killer before he strikes again? S7, Ep2

Teleshopping.
Teleshopping.
Wounded by Wire. The Detroit Police has requested assistance in dealing with a houseful of reptiles discovered during a raid and Ramos and Bothuel soon have their hands full. S4, Ep4
Women Who Kill. A chilling look at the work of female killers. They can be as deadly as their male counterparts, but they choose less violent methods. S3, Ep8
A Taste of Poison. Poisoners: devious killers relying on their victim's trust in order to steal their lives. Find out why they don't usually stop at just one kill. S3, Ep9
Without Mercy. Re-examines the investigation into a US bank heist of 1997, in which two armed men opened fire on staff and police officers at close range without mercy. S6, Ep1
Brutal Abduction. Re-examines the 1996 investigation into the abduction of a 17-year-old boy from a shop near his home, followed by ransom demands for $30,000. S6, Ep3
Danielle Jones. In 2001, 15-year-old Danielle Jones disappeared on her way to school. Two decades on, her family still fight for justice. S5, Ep6
The Other Modesto Girl. The disappearance of Dena Raley-McCluskey was lost in the media frenzy over higher profile killings, until a bored cop stumbled upon her years-old case. S4, Ep8
Maura Murray: Miles to Nowhere. On a moonless, windy night Maura's car swerves and leaves the road - she is never seen again. But what happened to her? S1, Ep2
Body In A Barrel. In 2017, Omar Medina's body was found in a barrel in the bay. Police turn to surveillance footage to track down the people responsible for his murder. S9, Ep17
Lewis Daynes. Breck Bedner was a 14-year-old boy who was groomed online and then murdered by 18-year-old Lewis Daynes. What caused this teenager to kill an innocent adolescent? S1, Ep10
Control Freak. When two bodies turn up in a car crash, investigators uncover the grizzly truth about a seemingly perfect relationship. S11, Ep1
Mom Is Always Right. A Mississippi husband who uses a wheelchair turns violent when his loving wife tries to end their marriage. Was it self-defence - or murder? S11, Ep2

programmes.show_name: American Detective With Lt Joe Kenda
programmes.show_description: Radio Silence. The body of a promising young radio host turns up near a road in south Houston. Det. Harris takes the case, and uncovers a tragic tale of love and deceit. S2, Ep5
Nicola Hughes And Fiona Bone. In September 2012, Dale Cregan murdered PC Nicola Hughes and PC Fiona Bone, after luring them to a callout by making a false 999 call. S5, Ep9
The Man In The Cowboy Hat. In 2016, a motel cleaner finds the body of an unidentified woman in one of the rooms. Detectives use CCTV to track a mysterious suspect in a cowboy hat. S9, Ep10
Risking It All. In New Mexico, a car chase ends with lasting consequences for a lieutenant, and a lone officer must keep her cool to safely detain a homicide suspect. S6, Ep5
What The Rage. A mum defends her kid from a group of bikers. A deranged driver repeatedly rams another motorist. A driver defends himself from aggressive motorists. S2, Ep3
Highway Hazards. A group of women gets into a gigantic brawl in a Florida intersection. A motorcycle causes a massive accident. A man ploughs through a parade route. S2, Ep4
Danielle Jones. In 2001, 15-year-old Danielle Jones disappeared on her way to school. Two decades on, her family still fight for justice. S5, Ep6
